properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 8 at 9:30PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
A band of moderate snow, extending from Ticonderoga, New York
eastward to White River Junction, Vermont, will slowly continue to
sink southward over the next several hours. Impacts to travel are
expected with sharp visibility reductions down to 1 mile being
reported in the heaviest snows. Roads may become quickly snow
covered. Drivers should use caution and be alert for rapidly
changing conditions.
properties.instruction:
Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations.
Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow
extra time when traveling.

NWSheadline: Moderate Band of Snow to Impact Rutland and Windsor Counties
